person.persName: John P. Gray, Jr. (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Peachey Ann Coleman Gray in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 25, 1846. Father of Moses C. Gray, John Gray, and Linn Boyd Gray. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Long Pond in 1860.
